name: l8
description: l8 is a task manager for javascript. A task is a function broken in steps. l8 comes with synchronisation and distribution tools including semaphores, mutexes, message queues, generators, actors and socket.io proxied actors, among others.

scripts.test: echo "pwd" ; pwd ; echo "ls ." ; ls . ; echo "ls lib" ; ls lib ; echo "ls test" ; ls test; ln -s ../. node_modules/l8 ; echo "ls node_modules" ; ls node_modules ; echo "ls node_modules/l8" ;  ls node_modules/l8 ; echo "run tests..." ; node test/suite.js && node test/actor.js

author: Jean Hugues Robert
